item.title: Pro Tips for Grad Students in Statistics/Biostatistics (Part 1)
item.description: I just finished teaching a Ph.D. level applied statistical methods course here at Hopkins. As part of the course, I gave one “pro-tip” a day; something I wish I had learned in graduate school that has helped me in becoming a practicing applied statistician. Here are the first three, more to come soon.Â A major component of being a researcher is knowing what’s going on in the research community.
